entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
